text:
Hello everyone! Would anyone have any ideas of tips on the best way to edit an application listed in the marketplace and test it before publishing?
I have an app in the marketplace and I would like to edit it. Before editing and submitting it for review by the HubSpot team, I would like to test it internally with several people. Does anyone have any advice on how to do this? I'm thinking of creating a private app to test and then editing the published application listed in the marketplace.

Hello, I have posted this query in API.

It relates to Public Apps response to the fetch request and values showing as Invalid Property.

I will provide link to question instead of writing it out again.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1716822791629079|https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1716822791629079>
